thread.section_title: The Nadler Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Visit 23rd and 24th February
thread.title_full: Visit 23rd and 24th February - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kim C
title: Visit 23rd and 24th February
text: This is our second stay at this hotel and we love it. Location is great very easy walk from Victoria Station. Rooms are modern and I love the kitchenette facilities. Staff very helpful and there is a great little Sicilian cafe next door who sell a wicked cherry pie! Will definitely be returning here.
